name: BURNER
description:
Each level in this rougelike beat'em up shooter is a 1000 block randomly generated bridge that you must cross, you start each game at the lowest level with almost nothing and move the character across the bridge, running, jumping, fighting enemies, avoiding hazards and collecting loot.
( accuracy - armor - batteries - food - ammo - health - jump - luck - punch - speed - spread - zoom - cash )

Combat is performed in real time action by punching, shooting, explosions from bombs or by simply pushing enemies off the bridge. The sun always rotates around the player and will destroy bridge blocks and can also be used as a weapon or disabled by purchasing the sun-stabilizer in the store. This game has rougelike permadeath, if the character dies they lose everything.

Completing each level rewards you with a cash bonus that can be saved or spent in the store on upgrades. Items and attributes can be sold and bought at fluctuating store prices, cash can also be gambled on the jack's or better lotto machine with double up feature.

This game is endless and scales in difficulty with each level. Stats, enemies, levels and other variables can be altered by the player.

Your ultimate goal is to improve your character and manage your resources so you can achieve the highest level, amount of cash, guts or kills. At the end of the game your final performance is displayed on screen in the four main categories and added to a local top 10 high score leaderboard listing all your top previous runs.

1000 block bridge blocks can be destroyed by the sun or bombs

Boss fight after every 3rd level

12 different death animation cut scene's

Top 10 high score save slots, with name, for 4 categories (global leaderboards in future update)

Full keyboard and gamepad support

This game will be improved throughout 2022
